overview: “Troy oversees all product development activities at Voyant. Prior to Voyant, he was founder, architect and development director at the Gossamer Group, LLC, an IT consultancy for Fortune 500 financial services firms. A veteran of the dot-com era, Troy has also served as lead developer for Kurion, a content syndication company, and as a configuration specialist for Trilogy, an enterprise software provider. Prior to mainstream software development, he was a pioneer at DuPont and Ingersoll-Rand in the practical application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD) and other advanced computational techniques. Troy received a B.S. in Aerospace Engineering and an M.S. in Mechanical Engineering, both from Virginia Tech.” (Source: Voyant)
